channel.title: Small Empires videos by The Verge
channel.description:
The Verge has been releasing a video series called "Small Empires" on Youtube the last couple of weeks. In it Alexis Ohanian, one of the Reddit founders, visits a couple of startups in New York that have all built their own little empire. It's not completely focused on Bootstrapping (so far I believe 2 out of 4), but also not promoting / idealising the idea of outside money. It actually takes quite a nice personal approach and I really did enjoy watching them. Hopefully it's inspirational for others too :smile:
Below is the latest episode. Youtube should help you find the rest.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=20xS1V1kA5w

item.title: Small Empires videos by The Verge
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
Ah cool, thanks for posting this up. It’s an interesting idea.
